RxStudio 1.20211106
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Reference

Environment

Functions for setting up access to the Rx Studio APIs.

set_access_token()

Sets access token for Rx Studio API usage

Simulation endpoints

Functions for accessing the Rx Studio APIs for simulating personalized drug dosing.

Helpers

Functions for making it easier to define requests to the Rx Studio APIs.

dose()

Define a dose object to be passed to the Rx Studio API

concentration()

Define a concentration object to be passed to the Rx Studio API

regimen()

Define a dosing regimen object to be passed to the Rx Studio API
